message: Let's be fair. I'll take the lion's share this time, but you'll get a chance to make a counter-offer next round.
I'll give you a fair share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of
Let's compromise. I'll take a bit less this time, but I think this is a fair deal for both of us.  If you reject this, we'll be down to $95, and I'm not sure what your next offer will be.
I'll take a smaller share this time, but I'm not giving up
This is getting ridiculous. We're both losing money with every round. Let's split it a bit more evenly. I'm willing to take a bit less, but I'm not going to give you everything.
I'm not going to give up now, I'll take the majority this time
We're both losing money fast. This is my final offer, and it's the closest we'll get to a fair split. Take it, or we risk getting nothing at all.
